column2: BRIEF-MFA Financial Says Entered Into Credit Agreement With Lenders, Providing For $500 Mln Senior Secured Term Loan Facility June 16 (Reuters) - MFA Financial Inc: * MFA FINANCIAL INC - ON JUNE 15, CO AND UNIT, ENTERED INTO CREDIT AGREEMENT WITH LENDERS, PROVIDING FOR $500 MILLION SENIOR SECURED TERM LOAN FACILITY Source: (bit.ly/3fyP7R3) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-PG&E Corp Files For 5-Part, First Mortgage Bonds Offering Size Not Disclosed June 15 (Reuters) - PG&E Corp: * PG&E CORP FILES FOR 5-PART, FIRST MORTGAGE BONDS OFFERING; SIZE NOT DISCLOSED - SEC FILING Source: (bit.ly/2N2Xp7e) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-MFA Financial Reports Q1 EPS Of $0.20 May 8 (Reuters) - MFA Financial Inc: * MFA FINANCIAL, INC. ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.17 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * AS OF MARCH 31, 2018, BOOK VALUE PER COMMON SHARE WAS $7.62 * QTRLY NET INTEREST INCOME $53.2 MILLION VERSUS $66.9 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
